<a id="Lightmapper"></a>

# Lightmapper

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [LightmapperRD](LightmapperRD.md)

Abstract class extended by lightmappers, for use in [LightmapGI](LightmapGI.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class should be extended by custom lightmapper classes. Lightmappers can then be used with [LightmapGI](LightmapGI.md) to provide fast baked global illumination in 3D.

Redot contains a built-in GPU-based lightmapper [LightmapperRD](LightmapperRD.md) that uses compute shaders, but custom lightmappers can be implemented by C++ modules.
